definitions.text: be shown or be found to be
examples: The medicine turned out to save her life

definitions.text: establish the validity of something, as by an example, explanation or experiment
examples: The experiment demonstrated the instability of the compound
The mathematician showed the validity of the conjecture
The blood test showed that he was the father
Her behavior testified to her incompetence

definitions.text: prove formally; demonstrate by a mathematical, formal proof
put to the test, as for its quality, or give experimental use to
examples: This approach has been tried with good results
the dough rose slowly in the warm room

definitions.text: cause to puff up with a leaven
